labels.name: story
labels.value: User sees the 'مدونة الشهر' section on the home page

name: TC-19 | Verify that the 'مدونة الشهر' section is displayed correctly on the home page with one مدونة card.
description:
Test Objective: Confirm that the 'مدونة الشهر' section is displayed and contains exactly **one** Corpora card.
Steps:
1) Navigate to the base URL   (done in BaseTest).
2) Scroll to 'مدونة الشهر' section.
3) Assert the section is visible.
4) Assert that it holds one (and only one) card.
Expected Result: The "مدونة الشهر" section should be visible and display exactly one مدونة card.

steps.name: 🧭 Scrolled to element: [[ChromeDriver: chrome on windows (1278062e1b2aa06ab95f2fb86d08ce64)] -> css selector: section.section-the-month-corpus]
🔽 Scrolled & waited until 'مدونة الشهر' section is visible
📊 عدد العناصر باستخدام المحدد By.cssSelector: section.section-the-month-corpus div.item-details = 1
✅ تم التحقق: القسم ظاهر ويحتوي بطاقة واحدة فقط
📥 تم تحميل ملف الإعدادات بنجاح من config.properties
